visual_dna.palette: Deep red (#B11218) 70%, White (#FFFFFF) for contrast, subtle black accents

image_composition_analysis.focal_points: Main focus on bottle with ~70% saliency; text surrounds creating balance
image_composition_analysis.typography_style: Bold sans-serif for impact, classic brand font for identity

source_analysis.prompt_reconstruction: Studio photography of Coca-Cola glass bottle on deep red background, soft lighting accentuating condensation, classic brand typography, iconic color scheme, minimalistic yet classic composition, commercial advertising style --ar 16:9 --style raw
